description: Welcome to this sun-filled townhome in a quiet, family-friendly Clayton neighbourhood. Enjoy exceptional convenience with shops, schools and recreation minutes away. The open-concept main floor is warm and inviting, with abundant natural light. Freshly painted three years ago, the home includes a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and a rare full-size walk-in pantry, plus an additional main-floor storage closet. Storage is generous throughout, including a laundry with built-in cabinetry. The side-by-side double garage offers epoxy flooring, built-in cupboards, and a dedicated EV fast-charging outlet for added convenience. Surrounded by parks and green spaces, this home is ideal for families.
